channel.title: vcs on Schulich Ignite
channel.description: Recent content in vcs on Schulich Ignite

item.title: Intro to Github
item.description: In the last article we covered git and using it. We talked a bit about remotes, which are services that allow you to use git over the internet.

item.title: Intro to Git
item.description: In the last article we looked at version control systems. We looked at a very manual way of building one out with file folders, and noticed a few issues with our approach:

item.title: Intro to VCS's
item.description: Things change fast, and keeping track of those changes is not an easy task. Version control systems are built to help manage versions of software, and software changes.
